issues.title: Zero-touch vs escalation in exception handling
issues.description: AUTO-001 and STRAT-001 require invoice generation and billing to run without human intervention (zero-touch). NFR-AGENT-EXCEPTION-HANDLER-AGENT includes 'Eskalation', which typically implies human involvement. This creates a potential conflict with the zero-touch/no-human-intervention goal.
issues.suggestion: Clarify whether escalation is fully automated (to other agents/systems) or allows human intervention. If humans are involved, define exception thresholds and explicitly allow limited manual handling without violating zero-touch objectives.

issues.title: Overlapping responsibility for bank account creation
issues.description: REQ-016 states the system creates a new bank account for the user, while FR-FE-BANK-ACCOUNT-SETUP/US-003 specifies UI-based entry and management of bank accounts. The boundary between backend account creation and frontend data capture is not clear, leading to overlap.
issues.suggestion: Separate responsibilities: specify REQ-016 as backend service behavior (e.g., account provisioning/storage) and FR-FE-BANK-ACCOUNT-SETUP as UI capture/validation only.

issues.title: Fehlende Fehlerbehandlung bei POD-Validierung
issues.description: REQ-001 löst Rechnungen nach POD-Validierung aus, aber beschreibt keine Behandlung bei fehlender/ungültiger POD oder Validierungsfehlern.
issues.suggestion: Fehlerpfade definieren (z. B. POD fehlend, fehlerhaft, verspätet) inkl. Retry, Eskalation und manueller Freigabe.

issues.title: Unklare Definitionen zentraler Begriffe
issues.description: Begriffe wie POD, Zero-Touch, Autonomie-Grad, spezialisierte Agenten sind nicht definiert, was zu Interpretationslücken führt.
issues.suggestion: Glossar mit klaren Definitionen und Abgrenzungen ergänzen.

issues.title: Fehlende Integrationspunkte zu Kernsystemen
issues.description: Rechnungserstellung, Steuerberechnung und Zahlungsabgleich benötigen ERP/Accounting/Banking-Integrationen, die nicht spezifiziert sind.
issues.suggestion: Explizite Integrationen (ERP, Buchhaltung, Bank-APIs, Steuer-DB, Email/SMS) inkl. Auth, Datenformate und Fehlerszenarien definieren.

issues.title: Unvollständige User Journey für Rechnungsprozess
issues.description: Es fehlt der End-to-End-Fluss von Kundenanlage, Auftrag, Rechnung, Versand, Zahlung, Mahnung, Gutschrift.
issues.suggestion: Prozesskette und Zustände (Draft, Issued, Paid, Overdue, Canceled, Refunded) definieren.

issues.title: Fehlende Edge Cases bei Datenimport
issues.description: REQ-018/Customer Management erwähnt Import, aber keine Behandlung von Duplikaten, Teilfehlern, Encoding, Pflichtfeldern.
issues.suggestion: Import-Validierungen, Mapping, Fehlerberichte, Rollback/Partial-Commit festlegen.

issues.title: Unvollständige Sicherheitsanforderungen für sensible Daten
issues.description: Bankverbindungen, Steuer-IDs, Zahlungsdaten benötigen Verschlüsselung, Zugriffskontrolle und Audit Trails.
issues.suggestion: NFRs für Verschlüsselung at-rest/in-transit, RBAC, Logging, Auditability definieren.

issues.title: Fehlende Performance- und SLA-Anforderungen für Kernfunktionen
issues.description: Event-driven Verfügbarkeit ist definiert, aber keine Antwortzeiten/Throughput für Rechnungserstellung, Import, Dashboard.
issues.suggestion: SLA/SLOs für Latenz, Durchsatz, Batch-Verarbeitung und Dashboard-Refresh spezifizieren.

issues.title: Unklarer Ausnahmefluss und Eskalation
issues.description: AUTO-003 nennt automatische Behebung, aber keine Grenzen, Freigaben oder menschliche Eskalation.
issues.suggestion: Eskalationsmatrix, Schwellenwerte, Audit-Protokolle und menschliche Freigabe definieren.

issues.title: Fehlende Anforderungen an Rechtskonformität pro Land
issues.description: STRAT-002 nennt Compliance, aber keine länderspezifischen Regeln (Steuersätze, E-Rechnungspflichten).
issues.suggestion: Jurisdiktionen, Regelquellen, Update-Zyklen und Prüfmechanismen definieren.

issues.title: Unvollständige Kontoerstellung (REQ-016)
issues.description: Kontoerstellung nennt keine Identitätsprüfung, KYC/AML, Berechtigungen oder Fehlerfälle.
issues.suggestion: KYC/AML-Checks, Zustimmungsflüsse, Validierungen und Ablehnungsgründe ergänzen.

issues.title: Fehlende Anforderungen für Rechnungsvorlagen und Mehrwährung
issues.description: Rechnungserstellung erwähnt Templates, aber keine Vorlageversionen, Branding, Mehrwährung, Lokalisierung.
issues.suggestion: Template-Management, Lokalisierung (Sprache, Währung, Steuerschlüssel) definieren.

issues.title: Unklare Frontend-Komponenten ohne Funktionsumfang
issues.description: FR-FE-DATABASE-DESIGN, FR-FE-API-ENDPOINTS, FR-FE-FRONTEND-COMPONENTS sind unbestimmt.
issues.suggestion: Zweck, Eingaben/Ausgaben, Nutzerrollen und Akzeptanzkriterien definieren.

issues.title: No explicit acceptance criteria
issues.description: User stories do not provide measurable acceptance criteria, making it hard to define pass/fail conditions beyond the listed tests.
issues.suggestion: Add measurable acceptance criteria per story (e.g., response times, validation rules, data fields, success/failure conditions, audit log requirements).

issues.title: Vague terms in dashboard requirements
issues.description: Terms like “real time,” “quickly,” and “improve process efficiency” are subjective without latency thresholds or defined KPIs.
issues.suggestion: Define concrete refresh/latency thresholds, KPI definitions, and exception detection rules.

issues.title: Unspecified validation and security controls for bank account setup
issues.description: US-003 references validation and security controls but does not define required fields, encryption, masking, role permissions, or audit logging.
issues.suggestion: Specify mandatory fields, validation rules, encryption/masking requirements, and audit log events.

issues.title: Company settings scope unclear
issues.description: US-004 mentions legal/tax/address/billing defaults without specifying field formats, required values, or rules per jurisdiction.
issues.suggestion: Provide field-level constraints and jurisdiction-specific validation rules.

issues.title: Customer management rules not defined
issues.description: US-005 lists attributes but does not define validation rules (e.g., tax ID formats, credit limit bounds, payment terms), making tests ambiguous.
issues.suggestion: Define field constraints, allowable values, and validation behavior for each attribute.

issues.title: User profile settings expectations are untestable
issues.description: US-006 references RBAC enforcement and reliable session management without specifying roles, permissions, session timeouts, or notification rules.
issues.suggestion: Define role matrix, session timeout values, notification triggers, and audit requirements.

issues.title: Frontend database design is not testable
issues.description: US-007 implies configuring schemas via UI but provides no schema constraints, versioning rules, or validation criteria.
issues.suggestion: Specify allowable schema operations, validation rules, and success/failure outcomes.

issues.title: API endpoint configuration lacks measurable criteria
issues.description: US-008 mentions reliability and monitoring but no SLA, availability metrics, or validation for endpoint configuration.
issues.suggestion: Define expected endpoint configuration fields, validation, and availability/health-check thresholds.

issues.title: Standardized frontend components undefined
issues.description: US-009 uses subjective terms like “standardized” and “improve efficiency” without defining component library or usage rules.
issues.suggestion: Define component set, required usage, and measurable outcomes (e.g., consistency checks).

issues.title: Verification stories lack measurable success criteria
issues.description: US-010 to US-020 use terms like “reliability,” “accuracy,” “market-leading,” “ethical,” and “zero-touch” without thresholds, datasets, or audit requirements.
issues.suggestion: Define quantitative targets (latency, accuracy, availability, bias thresholds, compliance checks), test datasets, and audit evidence required.

issues.title: Orphan requirements
issues.description: Multiple requirements have no linked user stories, leaving them unvalidated by story-level traceability.
issues.suggestion: Create user stories that explicitly link to these requirements.

issues.title: Orphan user stories
issues.description: User stories without linked test cases reduce verifiability and coverage.
issues.suggestion: Add test cases for each orphan story and link them explicitly.

issues.title: Missing bi-directional traceability
issues.description: Requirements do not list backlinks to their user stories, making bi-directional traceability incomplete.
issues.suggestion: Add explicit back-references from requirements to linked user stories.

recommendations: Conduct additional requirement elicitation to fill identified gaps
Refine acceptance criteria to be more specific and measurable
Establish clear links between requirements, user stories, and test cases
